roleset.name: to rise, be preeminent
roleset.note: TOWER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls exist-47.1-1, spatial_configuration-47.6. (from tower.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The man-made inferno will tower over a man-made lagoon with more than four acres of pools , grottoes and waterfalls .
example.arg: over a man-made lagoon with more than four acres of pools , grottoes and waterfalls
